name: Gamebook: Pocket RPG
description:
Walk into the Land of Lanthir Lamath ruled by wicked skeletons and fight for your life in a thrilling adventure.

It's a book. It's a game. It's a gamebook.

Interactive fun for almost an hour.

  • Simple rules and gameplay.
  • You are only running from room to room, up, down, left, right, anywhere.
  • Sometimes you can find item or weapon.
  • You will fight the skeletons and other monsters.
  • You will experience some magic.
  • And get a lot of fun.
More info at: http://pocketrpg.llstd.com
